Text.name: Text0
Text.content:
The Mercury demo site /mercury-demo/ is accessible as a sub-site of the default site /sites/default/.

GET /json/sites/default/mercury-demo/
{
  ".content": {},
  ".galleries": {},
  "about": {},
  "advanced-elements": {},
  "blog": {},
  "content-elements": {},
  "demos": {},
  "detail-pages": {},
  "downloads": {},
  "events": {},
  "faqs": {},
  "home": {},
  ..
}
